title: Rageborn Mundo skin bug!
body: Just playing a game as support and the enemy Mundo using the Rageborn Mundo skin  threw an his cleaver at me. I didn't see it. The windup animation of his arm going back happened but the cleaver itself never showed. I asked in chat and the top laner said the same thing, that all game the cleavers had been invisible. This is a pretty bad bug to not be able to see his cleavers as laning against him would be horrible. I'm thinking the skin should be disabled or something.

replies.body: This appears to be some kind of graphics issue, as it's not happening on all computers. (I've checked my laptop as well as my desktop.) Would you mind attaching your DXDiag, so we could get some more info regarding the bug? :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=445dGcy5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-23T21:39:03.830+0000)
>
> This appears to be some kind of graphics issue, as it's not happening on all computers. (I've checked my laptop as well as my desktop.) Would you mind attaching your DXDiag, so we could get some more info regarding the bug? :3

No problem! Hope this helps!!!
Work to get visual evidence, it usually gets more attention. If you cant find someone who does and support them.
